tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: My name is Amjad Khalid Memon age 52yrs had visited Dr Saba Rasool for my dental treatment.I had my CBCT done which had negative intimation for normal implants so PSI implants which is the latest technology were done which is 100% sure success. After surgery there is pain but no pain no gain,you have to keep the implants clean for longer durability.The clinic is neat and clean and staff courteous.I will suggest Dr Saba Rasool to all my friend relatives.Dr Saba Rasool always replied to my chats and never got annoyed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to Emerald Glow Dental Centre as my tooth was hurting and I was in pain. I was really scared and anxious, but  Dr. Saba Rasool immediately put me at ease. She was very attentive to my anxiety and did a great job to make me feel comfortable. Her explanation was thorough and clear. The procedure of my tooth extraction was performed quickly, in less than 10 minutes and there was no pain when my tooth was pulled out. The staff was very helpful and made me feel relaxed. I am very happy with my visit and would look forward to seeing them again for my routine dental treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had a great experience. Dr. Saba was very gentle and made me feel at ease. I have never experienced such a thorough check up and cleaning. She explained everything in detail. The staff was caring, professional and friendly. I highly recommend to all who are looking for a dentist.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr was vry patient nin explaining me n clearing my doubts as I m a vry fussy patient.i hv troubled her a lot but she s vry sweet n professional n hv explained each n every step bfr doin anything...I m really vry happy n satisfied with her wrk n wl always go bk to her fr any problem of myn in future and can vouch fr her wrk to anyone now eyes closed .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Saba Rasool is a class doctor, intelligent, understanding and empathetic. She would thoroughly check the problem and then advice. She is an authentic doctor and wouldn’t unnecessarily recommend dental treatments unless absolutely needed. Her work is very clean and quaint. She’s designed my entire smile and gave me my confident look again. I am very happy having found her and have associated myself with her for years now and as many as they come.

tags: None

  I had best experience  with Dr friendly caring loving and above all excellent human
